title: BATTLE OF BUNKER HILL: AN APPEAL TO HEAVEN - Regiments of American Revolution Mod Gameplay
description:
BATTLE OF BUNKER HILL: AN APPEAL TO HEAVEN - Regiments of American Revolution Mod Gameplay - Hey guys! Welcome to the battle of Bunker Hill. We are using the Regiments of American Revolution mod on Empire Total war. This is a 1v1 online battle between the British and American colonist. Enjoy the Battle :D

Mod Link: http://www.moddb.com/mods/regiments-of-american-revolution

Other Bunker Hill Videos: 
Born in the Fire: America Mod:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l7imMyOvNvc

Whigs and Tories Mod: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6i5rIhL8TWI&t=25s

JOIN MY DISCORD SERVER: https://discord.gg/JjR7UR3

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
